title: Missing BE
body:
So.... After logging on for the first time since the patch the game tells me that I can claim a total of 23 K BE to add onto my already 13 K to make 36 K. 

I clicked the Ok, Cool button and it didn't do anything. I Still only have 13 K

I also purchased rune page bundles years ago and the game told me that I was supposed to get an epic skin but it didn't show me which ones or if I got any at all. 

Am I missing something here?

replies.body: I did the same thing earlier today. Go play a game and it'll show up!

> [{quoted}](name=Vonderhamz,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=E7T8Tia5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-08T23:02:30.014+0000)
>
> I did the same thing earlier today. Go play a game and it'll show up!

You're right, I just played a few games and the skins showed up for the first one, and the second game my BE showed up. Thanks for the reply!
